import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ArrowRight, Star, Shield, MessageCircle, Award, Users, Briefcase, CheckCircle, Play, Quote, TrendingUp, Clock, DollarSign, Globe, Heart } from 'lucide-react'; const LandingPage = () => { const [activeTestimonial, setActiveTestimonial] = useState(0); const features = [ { icon: Shield, title: 'Secure Payments', description: 'All payments are protected by our secure escrow system. Funds are released only after project completion.', color: 'var(--colors-primary-lime)' }, { icon: MessageCircle, title: 'Real-time Chat', description: 'Communicate directly with clients through our integrated messaging system with file sharing.', color: 'var(--colors-secondary-purple)' }, { icon: Award, title: 'Portfolio Building', description: 'Build your professional portfolio and reputation with verified reviews from completed projects.', color: 'var(--colors-neutral-dark)' }, { icon: Users, title: 'Trusted Community', description: 'Connect with verified students and local businesses in your university community.', color: 'var(--colors-primary-lime)' } ]; const testimonials = [ { name: 'Sarah Chen', role: 'Computer Science Student', university: 'Stanford University', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612b786?w=80&h=80&fit=crop&crop=face', quote: 'GigCampus helped me earn $2,400 in my first semester while building my portfolio. The escrow system gave me confidence that I\'d get paid fairly.', rating: 5, earnings: '$2,400' }, { name: 'Marcus Johnson', role: 'Business Owner', company: 'Campus Coffee Co.', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=80&h=80&fit=crop&crop=face', quote: 'I found amazing student designers who created our logo and website for a fraction of professional rates. The quality was exceptional!', rating: 5, projects: '3 completed' }, { name: 'Emily Rodriguez', role: 'Graphic Design Student', university: 'UC Berkeley', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=80&h=80&fit=crop&crop=face', quote: 'The platform connected me with local businesses that needed design work. I\'ve built lasting relationships and a strong portfolio.', rating: 5, projects: '12 completed' } ]; const stats = [ { number: '10,000+', label: 'Student Freelancers' }, { number: '5,000+', label: 'Completed Projects' }, { number: '$500K+', label: 'Total Earnings' }, { number: '50+', label: 'Universities' } ]; const categories = [ { name: 'Web Development', icon: 'üíª', projects: '245' }, { name: 'Graphic Design', icon: 'üé®', projects: '189' }, { name: 'Writing', icon: '‚úçÔ∏è', projects: '156' }, { name: 'Tutoring', icon: 'üìö', projects: '298' }, { name: 'Marketing', icon: 'üìà', projects: '134' }, { name: 'Photography', icon: 'üì∏', projects: '87' } ]; return (
